title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: When using the New Package Wizard, a confusing message is displayed.
EB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard should provide clear instructions on how to proceed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
